tudarmstadt.lt.ABSentiment.training

Class LinearTraining

  • java.lang.Object
    • tudarmstadt.lt.ABSentiment.training.LinearTraining
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputeIdfTermsCategory, LinearTesting, Train, Train, Train, Train_de, Train_de, TrainCoarse

    public class LinearTraining
extends java.lang.Object
    Training Class that is extended by all linear learners. Offers methods to train Models using different FeatureExtractors.

    • Method Detail

      • loadFeatureExtractors

        protected static java.util.Vector<FeatureExtractor> loadFeatureExtractors()
        Loads and initializes FeatureExtractors for training and testing. Ensures that there is no feature ID overlap between different FeatureExtractors.
        Returns:
        a Vector of FeatureExtractor entries

      • buildProblem

        protected static de.bwaldvogel.liblinear.Problem buildProblem(java.lang.String trainingFile,
                                                              java.util.Vector<FeatureExtractor> features,
                                                              java.lang.String type)
        Builds the Problem from a training file, using provided FeatureExtractors. Stores feature vectors in a file.
        Parameters:
        trainingFile - path to the training file
        features - Vector of FeatureExtractors
        type - The type of the problem: relevance, sentiment, aspect
        Returns:
        Problem, containing the extracted features per instance

      • buildProblem

        protected static de.bwaldvogel.liblinear.Problem buildProblem(java.lang.String trainingFile,
                                                              java.util.Vector<FeatureExtractor> features)
        Builds the Problem from a training file, using provided FeatureExtractors.
        Parameters:
        trainingFile - path to the training file
        features - Vector of FeatureExtractors
        Returns:
        Problem, containing the extracted features per instance

      • resetLabelMappings

        protected static void resetLabelMappings()

      • applyFeatures

        protected static java.util.Vector<de.bwaldvogel.liblinear.Feature[]> applyFeatures(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas cas,
                                                                                   java.util.Vector<FeatureExtractor> features)
        Applies FeatureExtractors to a given CAS. Each FeatureExtractor creates an individual array of Feature entries.
        Parameters:
        cas - the CAS that the FeatureExtractors operate on
        features - a vector of FeatureExtractors
        Returns:
        a vector with an Feature array from each FeatureExtractor

      • combineInstanceFeatures

        protected static de.bwaldvogel.liblinear.Feature[] combineInstanceFeatures(java.util.Vector<de.bwaldvogel.liblinear.Feature[]> instanceFeatures)
        Helper method to combine Feature arrays that are produced by several FeatureExtractors, when applied to a single document.
        Parameters:
        instanceFeatures - a Vector of Feature arrays that should be combined
        Returns:
        one Feature array to be used as a training instance

      • saveLabelMappings

        protected static void saveLabelMappings(java.lang.String mappingFile)
        Saves the label--identifier mappings in a TAB separated file using the following format:
        LABEL_ID   LABEL
        Allows for retrieving the original String labels in classification.
        Parameters:
        mappingFile - the path to the file

      • getLabelId

        protected static java.lang.Double getLabelId(java.lang.String label)
        Gets the LabelId for a given String label. If the label has not been encountered yet, returns a new Double value.
        Parameters:
        label - the String label
        Returns:
        Double value to be used as an instance label

      • getLabelString

        protected static java.lang.String getLabelString(java.lang.Double labelId)
        Gets the String label for a given label ID.
        Parameters:
        labelId - the label ID
        Returns:
        the String representation of the label

      • trainModel

        protected static de.bwaldvogel.liblinear.Model trainModel(de.bwaldvogel.liblinear.Problem problem)
        Trains the linear classifier Model from a given Problem. Returns the trained Model.
        Parameters:
        problem - the Problem containing all the training instances
        Returns:
        trained model

      • saveModel

        protected static void saveModel(de.bwaldvogel.liblinear.Model model,
                                java.lang.String modelFile,
                                boolean saveGzipped)
        Saves the Model in a model file. The file can be compressed.
        Parameters:
        model - the model to be saved
        modelFile - path to the output file
        saveGzipped - boolean flag to enable model compression (recommended)

      • saveModel

        protected static void saveModel(de.bwaldvogel.liblinear.Model model,
                                java.lang.String modelFile)
        Saves the Model in a model file. By default, compresses model and appends .gz to the filename.
        Parameters:
        model - the model to be saved
        modelFile - path to the output file
